job_title: I am an experienced developer with a passion for creating unique digital experiences!
about_subtitle: Everything you could possibly want to know about me.
about_footer: In the bar below you'll see icons for everything I'm actively working with.
about_text: Hey! I'm a developer who likes to turn ideas into reality. I specialize more in the backend, but the frontend is not a problem for me either. I also develop games in Unity, occasionally in Godot. I am not afraid of challenges.
projects_section_subtitle: All projects of which I am a direct owner or have participated in their development.
jartexsmp_desc: Minecraft server that offers its players a cozy environment with a unique experience.
studentarium_desc: Forums for students looking for help, or even just a chat!
more_projects_soon: More projects will appear here soon!
contact_subtitle: Do you have any questions? Or do you want to collaborate? Don't hesitate to contact me!
